name: df-nmfn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cnmf, cmpt(s0, co(cc, cmap, chba), csup(cab(s1, wrex(s2, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s2)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cabs, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))), cxr, clt)))
comment: Define the norm of a Hilbert space functional. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
